title: Stake-Take Faucet for Namada Testnet with Enhanced Security and Namada Extension Support
description: Developed a faucet for Namada with Namada Extension support. Includes frontend, backend, API, and database to ensure security and prevent abuse. Successfully operated throughout the testnet.
notes: Our faucet successfully operated throughout the Namada testnet, showcasing seamless integration with Namada Extension, robust security, and a user-friendly design. We are open to feedback and collaboration to further enhance this tool for the Namada ecosystem.
